title: PM Modi embarks on three-nation visit beginning with Jordan - The Hindu
snippet: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday (December 15, 2025) embarked on a visit to Jordan, Ethiopia and Oman — countries which enjoy civilizational ties and exceptional bilateral relations with India.

title: Prime Minister Narendra Modi departed for Ethiopia from Jordan - The Hindu
snippet: In a gesture reflecting the warm Indian-Jordan bilateral ties, HRH Crown Prince Al-Hussein bin Abdullah II drove PM @narendramodi to the airport and saw him off. PM emplanes for the second leg of his tour — Ethiopia," Ministry of External Affairs Official Spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal posted on social media. In his first visit to Ethiopia, the Prime Minister will address the Joint Session of Parliament and share his thoughts on India's journey as the "Mother of Democracy" and the value that the India-Ethiopia partnership can bring to the Global South. Mr. Modi will also hold discussions with Ethiopia's Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed Ali and meet the Indian diaspora.

title: Putin, Modi agree to expand and widen India-Russia trade, strengthen friendship | Reuters
snippet: Russia's President Vladimir Putin and India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi walk ahead of their talks in New Delhi, India, December 5, 2025.
